Gravity would be attracted to positive energy and repelled from negative energy.
Time would flow in a non-linear fashion, allowing for multiple timelines to coexist.
The laws of physics would be different, allowing for the creation of objects that defy our current understanding of reality.
There would be no predeterminedation, allowing for the possibility of infinite outcomes.
The laws of nature would be more fluid, allowing for the possibility of shapeshifting and the ability to manipulate reality on a molecular level.
